INSERT INTO tb_user_essence_single ( sid, essence_id, uid, status, expiration, possession_type, order_no, auditor_uid, audit_remark, remark, sortt, split_db_key, del_flag, create_by, create_dt, update_by, update_dt, versionn) values( #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{essenceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expiration,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{possessionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditorUid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{auditRemark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{splitDbKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{versionn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE tb_user_essence_single
essence_id = #{essenceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},

WHERE sid = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
